name: Fortune: Rewritten
description:
Fortune: Rewritten is a new take on the original Fortune. The game features brand new features, graphics, major improvements, and much more!
Players will battle head-to-head in a PvP Battle Royale against AI to see who will come on top. Winning a match will earn you "Gold", which you can use to purchase brand new cosmetics in the shop! Fight with weapons and equipment until one player stands!
